scenes.action_text: CARRIE Written by Lawrence D. Cohen & Stephen King FADE IN: From an absolutely glistening WHITE � an image which first appears to be a brilliantly shining glass globe, and then gradually becomes more of a piece of solid matter, less of a mystery. It's the EXT. WHITE BUNGALOW (OR HOUSE) � DAY 1. FILLING THE FRAME like a picture postcard. Modest, old-fashioned, spotless � a vision of small town normalcy and virtue. This is th
